name: Butch

topics.topic_text: Mrs. Palmer said I didn't have to share. Since it's my birthday...
topics.response_text: "Mrs. Palmer said I didn't have to share"... Who's talking about sharing, moron? I want the whole thing.{first part is in a mocking imitation of the player's line}Play soundFO3 Butch WhosTalkingAbout.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_WhosTalkingAbout.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How about we share it? Half for me, half for you. That's fair, right?
topics.response_text: "How about we share it"... What are you, five? Give me that sweetroll or I'm going to pound you.{mocking the player}Play soundFO3 Butch WhatAreYouFive.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_WhatAreYouFive.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You can have it. I don't even like sweetrolls.
topics.response_text: Yeah, right. Thanks, loser. Oh, and happy birthday, ha ha ha ha!Play soundFO3 Butch ThanksLoser.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_ThanksLoser.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Sure, Butch. <Spit on the sweetroll and give it to him.>
topics.response_text: Gah! I don't want your nerd-cooties! You're going to be sorry you did that. We'll see how tough you are later when the grownups aren't around.Play soundFO3 Butch DontWantYour.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_DontWantYour.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Go soak your head, Butch. I'm not giving you my sweetroll.
topics.response_text: Oh yeah? We'll see about that.{grinning with anticipation of punching you in the face}Play soundFO3 Butch WellSeeAboutThat.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_WellSeeAboutThat.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You do look hungry. What, your mom drank up all the ration coupons again?
topics.response_text: Don't you talk about my mom, you little punk!{enraged}Play soundFO3 Butch DontYouTalkAbout.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_DontYouTalkAbout.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I threw it away. But you're welcome to eat it off the floor if you want.
topics.response_text: You think you're funny? We'll see how funny you are later when I'm pounding on your face. Come on, Paul, this loser ain't worth our time.Play soundFO3 Butch ThinkYoureFunny.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_ThinkYoureFunny.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Mmmm... It sure was good when I ate it a few minutes ago.
topics.response_text: You what?! Dang, I love those sweetrolls Old Lady Palmer makes. You... little... Just stay out of my way, you got it?{almost sputtering with frustration  you cheated him out of both the sweetroll and the chance to bully you for it}Play soundFO3 Butch LoveThoseSweetroll.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_LoveThoseSweetroll.oggnoicon

What's the matter, teacher's pet? Gonna cry? Awww... Waaahh! Go run home to daddy.Play soundFO3 ButchDeLoria WhatsTheMatter.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_ButchDeLoria_WhatsTheMatter.oggnoicon
I'm hungry and that stupid robot destroyed the cake.Play soundFO3 Butch ImHungry.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_ImHungry.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: You're going to be sorry, you little smartmouth.Play soundFO3 Butch GoingToBeSorry.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_GoingToBeSorry.oggnoicon

Hey, Officer Gomez. Nice party, huh?{trying to be excessively cool and laid back, even though he knows he's in trouble}Play soundFO3 Butch HeyOfficerGomez.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_HeyOfficerGomez.oggnoicon

Who wants to go around all day being called a "Vault Dweller"? Sometimes I think you really are as dumb as you look.Play soundFO3 Butch WhoWantsToGo.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_WhoWantsToGo.oggnoicon
So what do you think we should call our gang? It's got to be totally killer, though.Play soundFO3 Butch WhatDoYouThink.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Butch_WhatDoYouThink.oggnoicon

description:
Butch is a 19 year-old Caucasian Male.

Born and raised in Vault 101, Butch is a young adult who has spent his entire life within the vault's walls. Under the care of his alcoholic mother Ellen, who neglected his upbringing, Butch developed deep-seated feelings of inadequacy, particularly regarding his absent father. To mask these insecurities, he puts on a persona of a boorish bully, leading the Tunnel Snakes gang and asserting dominance over other vault dwellers.

Butch's Personality: Insecure yet outwardly arrogant, Butch presents himself as a tough gang leader to hide his vulnerabilities. He's desperate for acceptance and recognition, often resorting to intimidation and bullying to establish his position within the Vault 101 social hierarchy. Despite his rough exterior, there are moments where his vulnerability shows, particularly when discussing his family or his need for approval.

Butch's Backstory: Butch has lived his entire life in Vault 101, born to Ellen sometime before 2258. His alcoholic mother provided minimal supervision, leading him to seek validation elsewhere. At age 10, he attempted to bully the young Wanderer out of a sweetroll, an early indicator of his tendency toward intimidation. As he grew older, Butch formed the Tunnel Snakes, a gang of like-minded vault dwellers who shared his desire to establish dominance within the confined society of Vault 101. His relationship with Oversear Alphonse Lonegan's daughter Amata is particularly strained, marked by years of harassment and conflict.
